sections.purpose: To provide a flat heating surface for beakers and flasks.
sections.scope: Applicable to general heating in Pharmaceutical Analysis.
procedure: Ensure the hot plate surface is clean and free from chemical spills.
Place the vessel containing the sample on the center of the plate.
Power ON the unit and adjust the temperature control dial.
Monitor the temperature of the liquid using a thermometer.
Once heating is complete, turn OFF the power and unplug the unit.
Allow the plate to cool completely before cleaning.
Wipe the surface with a damp cloth after cooling.
precautions: Do not use the hot plate near flammable solvents.
Avoid touching the surface while it is hot.
Do not place plastic containers directly on the heating surface.
Ensure the electrical cord is kept away from the hot surface.
Mark the unit with a 'HOT' sign until it cools down.
